content:
This one should be inoffensive content-wise (it's a leaf file containing API for the most basic matroid constructions there are) but it's on my critical path to more interesting stuff. If someone could take a look, that'd be great.

(Similarly, #12665 is just a minor design change)
Might @Jihoon Hyun be able to take a look?
I'll take a look in a few hours.

Thanks for looking at this! Would a maintainer be able to give this one a nudge?

(And also maybe #12665, which doesn't do anything mathematical)
Looks good to me :thumbs_up:
Can the people who think this looks good give an "approve" review on GitHub?
Just checking in on this - after @Kyle Miller 's help and suggestions, I think it is good to go.

Ruben Van de Velde said:

Can the people who think this looks good give an "approve" review on GitHub?
Looks like there are some ‘approve’ reviews now.
